name: Light puzzle
description:
Lightpuzzle is a experimental, prototype game made by students.

The keyword was 5 minutes, and Indra's net. 

This is one of the projects made by two Hungarian university's student collaboration BME (programmers) and SZFE (game art and designers).

The team:

Smodics Roland - Programmer

Szalkay Balázs - Programmer

Hidán Attila - Programmer

Heppes Áron - Art and modelling 

Gaál Krisztina - Game design
